title: Kahanthota Road
location: Vinseth Homes Road/Thunhadahena Road/Off Kahanthota Road., Malabe
details:
Malabe,Kahanthota Road,Vinseth Property Development luxury two story house for sale.

• 3 bedrooms, 2187 sqft.

• 3 bath rooms altogether,2 with attached to rooms.

• 10.45 perches.

• Fully Tiled, Well-built Ceiling, land escaping garden with a pond and water fountain.

• Modern roller shutter for the garage as you can see in the images.

• 1.3 km to Kaduwela Malabe Road.

• 3 km to Kaduwela Highway Entrance.(SOUTHERN EXPRESSWAY)..

• 5 km to Kaduwela Junction.

• Servant washroom

• Very convenient to any location.(Specially Colombo, Airport & its Suburbs)

• Clear deeds.

• Flood Free Area.

• Viewing can be arranged by appointments only.

• Genuine buyers only no brokers.

• Please contact Mr.Jayanath For More Information.
